name: The Restless Box
description:
You are a box, last of your kind, lost forever in the empty space! Facing off against enemies, you can only run, but never stop.

DISCLAIMER if you find yourself dying at the start of the game. Make sure you're moving. The point of the game is constant movement so if you stop, you'll die. Get points by being in a very close proximity to other squares. READ THE "READ ME" FILE
